Title: The Coat Hanger
Plot: The Monsignor takes an unlikely convert under his wing; Lana secures a new piece of evidence that can exonerate Kit; Dr. Arden witnesses a miraculous return.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language
GuestStars: Naomi Grossman, Fredric Lehne, Ian McShane, Rebecca Metz
